title: Very slow client!
body: Any tip to speed up i lag everytime i can't even write normal in chat lags in champions select lags on all please help!

replies.body: Sounds like you might be experiencing packet loss.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) of these impacted games to really know for sure.  Let me know what results you find!
